name: Duel with the Devil
description:
Dangerous demons have attacked the entire city and the city is in crisis.

you have accepted the mission to save the city

As a duelist with endless possibilities, you must fight against the evil demon army

Being wrong with the demon's powerful attacks can put your life in danger.

we have to find a way to survive in this crisis

If you defeat demons and gain experience points to level up, you can choose skills that will be randomly given to you.

Try to properly combine a total of 20 skills to create the best result

Victory or defeat can be determined by how you combine your skills, so you must choose carefully.

You may lose your life to the boss's powerful Chinese medicine, so you should use evasion techniques to avoid it
